summary: This document is an email chain from July 10, 2019, between Bureau of Prisons psychologists discussing the status of Jeffrey Epstein and another inmate, Tartaglione, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It reveals Epstein was in the SHU (Special Housing Unit) and was scheduled for a psychological evaluation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; he is being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, was in the SHU (Special Housing Unit), and was scheduled for a psychological evaluation (POFU).

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Another inmate housed with Epstein; described as a former police officer who is frustrated with his legal case and claims innocence.

connections.description: The email states 'We are housing him with Epstein,' indicating they were cellmates or housed together in the same unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein in SHU and Psychological Evaluation Scheduled
events.description: Email correspondence reveals Jeffrey Epstein was in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and was scheduled for a psychological evaluation (POFU) the following day.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated July 10, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein was being held in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Epstein was scheduled for a psychological evaluation (referred to as a POFU) on July 11, 2019.
Another inmate, Tartaglione, was housed with Epstein and was described as a former police officer frustrated with the legal system.
